item.title: The Many Facets of EDI Integration
item.description: This post was reproduced on PortX’s blog. The other day I read a simple yet thought-provoking thread on a message board. A company was about to embark on its first EDI integration journey but was pretty much clueless about EDI translators and what questions to ask to EDI providers. Though this might come as a surprise to the individual asking for guidance, the EDI translator, that is the program transforming the EDI file into a structure suitable for processing and vice-versa, however important, is only a small piece of the integration puzzle.
